scene: Raccoon dressed as a Greek Orthodox priest (Proistamenos) wearing elaborate golden vestments with Byzantine cross embroidery, a tall cylindrical hat (kalimavkion), holding a golden staff, dignified and warm expression, standing in front of an iconostasis

Raccoon dressed as an Orthodox presbyter wearing dark robes with a pectoral cross, holding an open liturgical book, kind scholarly expression, bookshelves and candles in the background, warm study atmosphere

Raccoon dressed as an Orthodox deacon wearing a white sticharion with an orarion (liturgical stole) draped over the shoulder, holding a lit candle, cheerful helpful expression, church altar in the background
